job_description:
Customer Success Manager

We are seeking an experienced Customer Success Manager to join our team. The candidate will play a key role in ensuring customer satisfaction, delivering client engagement excellence, and driving customer success through proactive measures.

Key Responsibilities

  • Act as the primary point of contact and trusted advisor for customers
  • Develop and nurture long-term relationships with the Customer stakeholders
  • Understand Customer requirements and business goals
  • Ensure frictionless onboarding & adoption of Tranzmeo’s product/solution.
  • Proactively review and manage customer accounts for greater Customer satisfaction and long-term retention.
  • Track & get the customer issues resolved promptly and effectively, escalating when necessary.
  • Conduct regular review meetings with the customer to provide insights on product usage and best practices.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional Tranzmeo teams (Sales, Product, Support) to ensure seamless customer experience.
  • Regularly monitor customer account health metrics and implement strategies to mitigate business risks
  • Develop new knowledge assets based on experiential insights from Customer engagements
  • Gather business insights of Customer needs and drive upsell / cross-sell opportunities

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Education: B.Tech degree (mandatory).
  • Experience: Minimum 7 years of relevant experience in Customer Success Management, Customer Delivery Management, or Customer Relationship Management.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Language Proficiency: Fluency in English and Hindi is mandatory.
  • Strong problem-solving and negotiation abilities.
  • Ability to manage multiple clients and priorities effectively.
  • Ability to quickly learn about the software products/solutions to guide clients in their business context
  • Familiarity with CRM tools and customer success platforms.

What We Offer

  • Competitive salary and benefits.
  • A dynamic, respectful and growth-oriented professional environment.
  • Opportunities for Career development and skill enhancement
  • Opportunities to gain highly valued professional experiences

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lakshmi@team.tranzmeo.com
summary: Seeking a Customer Success Manager to ensure customer satisfaction and drive success through proactive measures. This role involves nurturing relationships, resolving issues, and identifying upsell opportunities.

job_description:
Slot Game Mathematician

The Slot Game Mathematician will be responsible for developing game math models that balance player entertainment, business profitability, and regulatory requirements. You will work closely with game designers, producers, developers, and compliance teams to deliver games that are both fun to play and commercially successful.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design & Develop Game Math Models – Create engaging and mathematically sound slot game logic, including reel layouts, symbol distributions, pay tables, hit frequency, volatility, and bonus features.
  • Simulations & Analysis – Use statistical modelling and simulation tools to verify game performance against target KPIs (RTP, volatility index, feature frequency, etc.).
  • Regulatory Compliance – Ensure all game math adheres to jurisdictional requirements and prepare detailed math documentation for certification and regulatory submission.
  • Collaboration with Creative & Technical Teams – Partner with artists, designers, and engineers to ensure the math model aligns with the game’s creative vision and technical constraints.
  • Optimization – Analyse live game performance data to identify opportunities for tuning and improving engagement, retention, and monetization.
  • Innovation – Research emerging slot mechanics, trends, and market data to develop new mathematical concepts and innovative game features.
  • Documentation & Communication – Produce clear, precise mathematical specifications for developers and maintain records for internal review and regulatory approval.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree or higher in Mathematics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Proven experience designing and implementing slot game math models (online, land-based, or social).
  • Strong proficiency in probability theory, combinatorics, and statistical modelling.
  • Hands-on experience with simulation software/tools (e.g., MATLAB, Python, R, Excel with VBA).
  • Deep understanding of RTP, volatility, hit frequency, and progressive jackpot modelling.
  • Knowledge of gaming regulatory requirements in multiple jurisdictions (preferred).
  • Excellent problem-solving skills with strong attention to detail.
  • Ability to communicate complex math concepts to non-mathematical team members.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with progressive and linked jackpot systems.
  • Familiarity with multiple slot mechanics (ways-to-win, cluster pays, megaways, hold-and-spin, etc.).
  • Knowledge of market trends in both land-based and online slot games.
  • Experience with large-scale data analysis and A/B testing in live games.

How to Apply:

  • Send the CV to careersindia@rubyseven.com

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careersindia@rubyseven.com
summary: We are seeking a Slot Game Mathematician to design and implement math models for slot games. The ideal candidate will possess experience with statistical modeling, regulatory compliance, and collaboration with creative teams.

job_description:
Manager, Digital Services Sales

Zyxware Technologies is seeking a Sales Manager to join our Sales team. The primary goal is to generate revenue from assigned geographies. This involves identifying potential new customers, presenting our brand, and building long-term client relationships to foster future business growth.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve target revenue and margins for the designated geography and segment.
  • Responsible for sales planning and accurate forecasting, including identifying potential accounts, sizing opportunities, and go-to-market (GTM) planning and execution.
  • Determine client needs through a consultative selling approach and manage end-to-end buying cycles. Sales Support will assist with proposal development, agreement drafting, and sales collateral.
  • Manage revenue risk by maintaining a robust sales pipeline with qualified leads and prospects.
  • Present the organization's values, commitments, knowledge, and capabilities to clients and prospective buyers, representing Zyxware Technologies at relevant events.
  • Manage revenue booking and collections, maintain reports, and minimize payment defaults through continuous account health assessment.
  • Manage escalations from client accounts to ensure mutual satisfaction.

Preferred Skills and Experience:

  • A graduate degree in engineering or computer science, coupled with an MBA, is preferred. Other graduate degrees are acceptable with demonstrated interest in technology.
  • Familiarity with frameworks and tools for understanding markets and international trade, with the ability to construct value chains and define industry structure.
  • Develop and execute a sales plan that addresses market realities, including aggregate demand, seasonality, value chain, and associated supply chain.
  • Design and execute a sales process that aligns with the buying process of mid-sized enterprises (annual turnover above USD 10 million) and large businesses (annual turnover above USD 50 million).
  • Partner with HR to build a sales team and establish a working relationship with service delivery groups for effective solutioning for client acquisition and commercial viability of deals.
  • Consistent track record of revenue generation, risk management, and ability to access new markets.
  • Experience in handling B2B clients from the US/Europe/UK/ME/APAC regions.
  • Good knowledge of Google Workspace / MS Office, CRM, and Bid Management.
  • Candidates with US Business Visa will be preferred.
  • Strong communication & presentation skills (written and oral).
  • Prior experience in dealing with decision-makers (technical and non-technical) in the services sector.
  • 5+ years of relevant international sales experience in IT or Digital Services.

Location:

The selected candidate is expected to work from our office in Technopark, Trivandrum.

Contact:

If you meet the above requirements, please mail in your resume with the subject ‘Application for the post of Manager, Digital Services Sales - MS30092402' to careers@zyxware.com.

Zyxware Technologies (P) Ltd SBC 2205, II Floor, Yamuna Building, Technopark Phase III, Trivandrum, 695583 http://www.zyxware.com
summary: Zyxware Technologies is hiring a Sales Manager to drive revenue growth in assigned regions. The role involves lead generation, client relationship management, and executing sales strategies.
